name: iron-barbs

effect.black_white: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.black_2_white_2: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.black_white: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
